page.title: 02Ayr. A local authority view.
page.content: . Ayr's big{employers}were engineering and carpet making. Carpet making has gone entirely and engineering is greatly reduced. 14% of the work force are unemployed. Finance limits the council to providing 'nest' factories to encourage small businesses to start up at low cost. We are building five more this year.. The{housing}waiting list totals 2000 but finance limits the council to building one bedroomed sheltered housing for elderly people. This year we are spending a million modernising houses 30 years old _central heating, insulation, fitted kitchens. Three big{shopping}developments are under construction and another is planned. We protect the architectural character of the town and insist on housing for rent and car parking being built in with the shops.
